Text: Fuck Glenn Beck, fuck you. Good day.

And so that is your argument? Simply "Fuck" Glenn Beck, someone trying to simply produce truthful information; "Fuck" me, for uploading a torrent for people to choose to see?  I really do hope for your sake that that isn't how you deem fit to treat other services or interactions in your life.  Why dont you scream "Fuck You!" at your internet provider, at your tax collector, or at your neighbor who supports a different sports team, and then come back and tell me if YOU had a "good day". 
  In fact, I know I have had a "good day". I watched a great documentary today. And while you hide behind a wall of hate, I am enjoying my day, my life, and my country. Good day.
I concure. Fuck Glen Beck hard, fuck him hard in the face with a shovel.

@Vinnyg007: 

First of all, people like me rely on others' kindness and generosity of spirit for our Beck, Limbaugh, Levin, etc. torrents. This is what is known as gratitude. With left-wing morons like you trying to regulate the internet and shut down conservative points of view, we truly appreciate the effort that goes into archiving and sharing sanity.

If you don't like it, don't listen. But I'll never understand the need of dorks like you who feel the compulsion to make profanity-laced comments about people whose points of view are opposite yours. I guess that fits the description of immaturity and goes to underline the mentality of those who vote for The One!

I'm convinced people like you suffer from TWP Syndrome, (Teeny Weeny Peeny) and get your jollies spewing idiocy that will be forever archived on the 'net.

@ Yelir55: Thank you for your efforts, and generosity of spirit! I appreciate the torrent!
